servinfo.title: CAN Communication System Diagnosis General Description
servinfo.ptxt: As a multiple number of control modules / sensors are involved in the CAN communication system, once a failure occurs in the CAN communication system, involved control modules detect communication errors simultaneously. When diagnosing a trouble in CAN communication system, be sure to have full understanding of each item in Precautions in Diagnosing Trouble:J24B and N32A Model and execute diagnosis according to CAN Communication System Check:J24B and N32A Model to obtain correct result smoothly.
